name: Eternal Blazon
flavor_text: "But this eternal blazon must not be to ears of flesh and blood."

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this weapon equipped.

perks.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Signal MS5

perks.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
perks.name: Impulse MS3

perks.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Transmission MS7

perks.description:
Omolon post sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Candle PS

perks.description:
Omolon post sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Spark PS

perks.description:
Omolon Post sights. Short zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Jolt PS

perks.description:
Omolon red-dot. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Flash HS5

perks.description:
Omolon red-dot. Medium zoom.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Torch HS3

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.
perks.name: Full Auto Trigger System

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo automatically loads this weapon beyond normal capacity.
perks.name: Overflow

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability.
perks.name: Slideshot

perks.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.
perks.name: Rapid Hit

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perks.name: Kill Clip

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh
